DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate effect lidocaine total administer dose fentanyl sedation endoscopic mucosal resection . The secondary purpose study investigate effect lidocaine pain score related endoscopic mucosal resection time 30 min , 6 hr , 24 hr procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Endoscopic submucosal dissection treatment early gastric neoplasm 1 . Allergy lidocaine 2 . Chronic pain 3 . Chronic abuse opioid NSAID 4 . Atrioventricular conductance block 5 . Liver dysfunction 6 . Renal dysfunction
